name: UIImage.Configuration
desc: A configuration object that contains the traits that the system uses when selecting the current image variant.

items.name: func applying(UIImage.Configuration?) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a configuration object that applies the specified configuration values on top of the current object's values.

items.name: func withTraitCollection(UITraitCollection?) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a new configuration object that merges the current traits with the traits from the specified trait collection.

items.name: var traitCollection: UITraitCollection?
items.desc: The traits associated with the image configuration.
